tuv.seg: Rights of residence in Ireland
Cearta Cónaithe in Éirinn
Residence rights of EEA nationals in Ireland
Cearta cónaithe in Éirinn do náisiúnaigh LEE
EEA nationals have the right to travel to Ireland and do not require a residence permit to remain here
Tá an ceart ag náisiúnaigh an LEE taisteal go hÉirinn agus ní theastaíonn ceadúnas cónaithe uathu chun fanacht anseo
There are however some limits on these rights
Tá srianta áirithe, áfach, ar na cearta seo - faigh tuilleadh eolais
Residence rights of family members
Cearta cónaithe do bhaill teaghlaigh
Foreign nationals who move to Ireland may be entitled to bring their family to live with them
D’fhéadfaidh náisiúnaigh eachtrannacha a bhogann go hÉirinn i ndteideal a gclann a thabhairt chun cónaí leo anseo
Residence rights of non-EEA nationals
Cearta cónaithe náisiúnach neamh-LEE
Description of how non-EEA nationals may be granted permission to remain that allows them to live in Ireland
Cur síos ar conas a fhaigheann náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE cead fanachta a ligeann dóibh cónaí in Éirinn
Types of residence permission for non-EEA nationals
Cineálacha an cheada cónaithe do náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE
There are various types of residence rights or permission to remain that allow non-EEA nationals to live in Ireland
Tá cineálacha éagsúla cearta cónaithe nó cead fanachta a cheadaíonn náisiúnaigh bheith ina gcónaí in Éirinn
Registration of non-EEA nationals
Clárú náisiúnach neamh-LEE in Éirinn
Describes the requirements for non-EEA nationals to register with the Garda Síochána and how they can do it
Cur síos ar riachtanais do náisiúnaigh neamh-LEE chun clárú leis an nGarda Síochána agus conas sin a dhéanamh
Residence rights in Ireland
Cearta cónaithe in Éirinn
Frequently asked questions on residence rights in Ireland
Ceisteanna coitianta maidir le cearta cónaithe in Éirinn
Residence rights of UK citizens
Cearta cónaitheachta shaoránaigh na RA
UK citizens can move to live in Ireland from any country without any conditions or restrictions
UK citizens can move to live in Ireland from any country without any conditions or restrictions
Most Read in "Moving Country"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Ag bogadh tíre"
Irish citizenship through birth or descent
Saoránacht d'Éirinn ó bhreith nó ó ghinealach
Visa requirements for entering Ireland
Riachtanais víosa le teacht isteach in Éirinn
Coming to work in Ireland
Ag teacht go hÉirinn chun oibriú
Becoming an Irish citizen
Ag éirí i do shaoránach Éireannach
